name: Photography Package
description: Capture your special day with our professional photography package. High-quality photos that will preserve your wedding memories.

name: Floral Arrangements
description: Enhance your wedding's beauty with stunning floral arrangements. Customized bouquets, centerpieces, and more.

name: Catering Services
description: Delight your guests with a delectable feast. Our catering services offer a range of delicious cuisines to suit your taste.

name: Venue Rental
description: Host your wedding in a picturesque venue. Our rental includes a beautiful setting for your special day.

name: DJ and Entertainment
description: Keep the party going with our professional DJ and entertainment services. Dance the night away with your loved ones.

name: Wedding Planning
description: Let us take care of the details. Our wedding planning services ensure a stress-free and memorable event.
